course_description: This course is designed to enhance the understanding of how to be a more effective team member and peer leader; enhance the understanding of the characteristics of a high performing MBA team and how to identify dysfunctions of a team; provide emphasis on how to give and receive feedback; learn how to assess the performance of a team; and learn how to use feedback by being coached by a 2nd Year MBA Leadership Coaching Fellow on your team and the individual performance on your MBA team.
sections: Class Nbr: 4838, Section #: 3201, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 4:30-5:30p, Instructor: R. Berlin, Status: Open
